website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular mattress protectors available for online purchase, this high-quality model is sure to impress.
pros: Offers protection against bed bugs, dust mites, bacteria, sweat, and urine
Features a closing zipper to protect against accidental openings
cons: Can be difficult getting the cover fitted to your bed

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer needs to test the mattress encasement capabilities again
customer_reviews.text: These are the reasons I purchased the product: “Breathable membrane allows airflow while repelling liquids”, “Completely waterproof and noiseless”, “Great for asthma, eczema and allergy sufferers”, “10 yr warranty”. This mattress encasement lasted 6 months before I had to throw it out. It’s not waterproof, it’s mot hypoallergenic and when I tried to return it. I wasn’t offered an immediate refund. $48.95 Out the window! Nice warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Smells really strongly of chemicals. Bought another a few years back and didn’t have this issue. Something’s changed...
customer_reviews.author: Tej

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, ripped when covering mattress
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally post reviews, but this was such a disappointment. I have a Queen sized bed, that’s about 11” high. From the reviews I had read, this should have been a perfect fit. However, it was too small. When I went to put it on the bed immediately after I opened it, it ripped while I was putting it on - rendering it useless. So, I didn’t even have a chance to use it, and now I’m out $50.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Defective zipper
customer_reviews.text: The zipper track was faulty so the top of the zipper got jammed and created a tiny hole. If this were an article of clothing this wouldn’t be a big deal but because any small defect allows bugs to get through, the product is now wholly ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bergquist

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of time and money!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for bed bugs assuming this would help unfortunately if they are tiny I PROMISE This will NOT HELP YOU!! They kept appearing and I kept getting bitten so I figured it out as I was changing the sheets. A total waste!! Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: LHicks

customer_reviews.title: Leaked through onto my tempurpedic
customer_reviews.text: My little Maltese has a little accident. She’s very small and doesn’t produce enough urine that it would bleed through the SafeRest. Needless to say, once I discovered the accident, I unzipped it and it had leaked through right into my $3000 mattress. It doesn’t work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a few months with gentle use
customer_reviews.text: Looked like nice quality at first and we were always gentle with it, but we only slept on this encasement for 3-4 months before one of the seams came apart near the velcro flap (making it no longer bug-proof). That could have caused a big headache if we were currently battling an infestation. And just today the zipper came completely off when we tried to install it on our new mattres. Maybe we just got a bad one, but I was hoping for better quality for the money spent. We never laundered it and only removed it once.
customer_reviews.author: Gian Napolitano

customer_reviews.title: Eeek! Bed Bugs!
customer_reviews.text: We had some friends traveling through and when they left a few "travelers" (bedbugs)'stayed behind. I freaked at first but then we waged war. We placed our electronics and things that could be heat treated in our storage building with pest strips We left them for a week while we cleaned, placed mattress and box spring covers, sealed cracks, and sprayed. Duck Taped played a big part! It wasn't fun but after repeating treatment, we haven't had anymore problems. Needless to say we are more cautious with visitors, invited or not!
customer_reviews.author: NanaNou

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: I’ve no doubt this does all it claims to do, but the waterproof part is really quite terrible to sleep on. The terry part does nothing. This is a basic, cheap, plastic feeling (and sounding) waterproof mattress cover. I cringed every time I turned over on this thing because of the terrible sound it made and the way it slid against the mattress. Made it 3 night and had to take it off for good. Would probably be fine on a child’s bed, but not for adults who accustomed to moderately nice things.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product really traps the bugs in, and keeps others out. Obviously more will need to be done to protect yourself than just encasing your bed and box spring, but this encasement is a good step. The material is good but the slickness makes the matress slide off the box spring if they're separately encased. It also tears really easy, this is my third time replacing it. It washes well but doesn't dry well at all, it holds a lot of water so it needs to drip dry for a long time before being able to go in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie and Kathy

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been wonderful. Bed bugs must have hitched a ride home ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been wonderful. Bed bugs must have hitched a ride home from one of my husband's trips. We believe we caught it early before they had a chance to spread throughout the house. No more unpacking suitcases on our bed! This was my first and hopefully last experience with them. We had recently purchased a $1200 mattress so discarding it was not practical. We chose to encase it and the box springs too. This along with all the other suggestions of pillow encasement, cleaning, decluttering, and regular vacuuming seems to have solved our problem. I am very please with the quality of the product and the guarantee gave me piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect a new mattress and for dust mite allergies. Pros: Cover was easy for a person to put on king size mattress alone. Cons: Cover is noisy. The noise is not extreme enough to interrupt sleep but may annoy someone who is sensitive to noise. Have not tested the waterproofing so unable to comment at this time however, nothing with the product has lead me to believe it would have issues. Based on the price would recommend as an affordable way to protect your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mains

customer_reviews.title: month in review.....
customer_reviews.text: at first i love this product. a month later the top layer already has a hole. the top layer is a soft fabric. but with a active child like mine who tosses and turn all night, the friction between the sheet and the protector caused pilling/strings to come up and now a hole. extremely disappointed as i saw all the great reviews so i had to highest hopes for it. not sure if i just got a defective one or what but im not going to have to look into another brand or something,.
customer_reviews.author: Travis mclean

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the box spring Encasement and not the mattress encasement. It was for my son’s bed and he is using it on the mattress. I don’t know how this will work out but will see. The product itself is well made. The zipper worked fine. I didn’t return it because my son already put it on his mattress
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof but otherwise fine!
customer_reviews.text: It's not waterproof/liquid proof. Our cat had an accident on it and it went right though it. And when we took it off for that, noticed a few other stains on the mattress. It is a good fit and quiet but it you want to protect your mattress against liquids, this is not the protector you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilmer

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I rent out fully furnished rooms and I have purchased high quality mattresses so to protect my $800 investment I purchased this encasement.......best decision ever! Had a renter who got drunk and covered the bed in several body fluids. this incident stained the sheets, comforter, and even the encasement but when it was removed the mattress looked and smelled brand new! I now keep a spare on hand just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Alaska man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Investment
customer_reviews.text: This is my third mattress encasement from SafeRest having bought a second for my guest bedroom and now another for a friend who had surgery and needed some extra mattress protection. I am very happy with the quality of this product. It washes very well. Once you get used to installing as an entire mattress casement it gets easier the more you handle it and you find your own way to easily install it. I would highly recommend buying an entire casement over a partial encasement, especially for those living in more tropical climates where bed bugs can be an issue. Great way to protect your mattress and prolong the life of your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Santini

customer_reviews.title: Get these before you have any problems with various critters!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on our mattresses. Substantial zipper. Unfortunately for my husband and I we had a bed bug infestation in our home after a visit from some family members who are definitely not welcome here again. After throwing out many things the Pest control company recommended we get these mattress covers. Keeping my fingers crossed that we got all those critters and these function as well as they are supposed toThis whole mess has cost me a lot of money and I don’t care to repeat this whole thing I can tell you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a wonderful job
customer_reviews.text: This encasement fit the 10-inch mattress perfectly. Just loose enough so that it wasn't too tight. The nicest feature is that 3 sides unzip. This allows the mattress to go into it properly-fitted all around. The youtubes show the method of placing it on. We had no trouble putting onto the mattress with the mattress already on the bed. Now our new mattress won't have bugs of anykind. It's protected from dust, moisture, bugs. Highly-recommend.
customer_reviews.author: snowy

customer_reviews.title: Zippers get stuck...a lot
customer_reviews.text: I got my mattress into the encasement just fine. The problem is that the zipper gets stuck...every 3 inches! Yank, pull, wriggle back and forth, it took me half an hour just to zip it closed. Because the zipper had problems, there are gaps which I had to seal with duct tape. So my finger is torn up and bleeding from yanking on a sharp pokey zipper pull and I had to run out for duct tape. Of course I am not going to wrangle it back off to return it, the situation calls for immediate encasement and I had to improvise, but feel it was a lot of pain and effort due to the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Good but stained
customer_reviews.text: Item was the right size and was easy to install. I have a cal king and was able to do it by myself (but recommend getting help). Appears well made. I noticed, as others have pointed out that it comes with stains on it. I don’t think it’s used as it was folded neatly in a sealed package - but there a stains in five places (see pictures). I also ordered the box spring cover but had to return it because they only included one twin was in the package. I don’t recommend this brands box springs.
customer_reviews.author: James Taylor

customer_reviews.title: JUST IN CASE
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. We have bought this same product and brand before on our last King size bed and again on the new one. I feel very secure with this mattress protector. Our mattress is fully 360 protected. We have never had bed bugs and of course don't want to. Look up ''bed bugs map USA''- if live or travel in the those areas- protect your mattress! It took two people to get the mattress pad over our king but it was not as bad a I thought. It seem water proof however we did not fully test it. There is no sound when turning in the bed like some waterproof protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy gill

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable Like They Say
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent mattress protector it does keep water etc off of your mattress, it's quiet, but I have to admit that this is not easy to get on a very heavy Cal King mattress. After 6 years of fairly light guestroom use, the zipper on this mattress protector broke, I don't expect they will honor their warranty that's just there for show not for real. Plus, you pay for shipping the very heavy huge thing to them, and they may or may not refund you. No, thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: sychedbyrain

customer_reviews.title: Quick to install with great durability
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my previous mattress and when I got a new mattress (Purple mattress) I immediately got another one for it. I will never have a mattress without one. It has withstood night sweating, liquid spills (water and wine) as well as constant use. Have moved my bed multiple times taking the mattress off and on dragging it out to the living room each time and the zippers have not come off or broke and there has been no tears either. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I just wanted a cover for my mattress for allergies. This product promises much more. I did not give this 5 stars because it stretches. I weight 145 pounds, and after two weeks, it was obvious where I sleep. I think washing it again would take the stretch out; however, who wants to wash a product that fully encloses a mattress every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Jane

customer_reviews.title: My first review was wrong. Good product and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I discovered the invisible zipper style led me to believe it was too small an opening. The zipper got stuck on one of the corners and I thought that was as far as it would go. Sorry, I was wrong, it works fine and can be put over a mattress easily. At first I stated "This was almost impossible to put over a queen mattress. It seems they mounted the zipper on the wrong side (long side) but there wasn't enough material to slide over the mattress. Amazingly difficult."
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is horrible missing teeth on zipper line cause seam to rip
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible! Bought utopia one for my kids and a safe rest one for my king size and it broke while sealing the mattress in! At the worst time because it was CRITICAL to seal up the mattress. The utopia one’s sealed up fine! On two twins and a queen! This one is absolutely horrid. If I could give no stars I would. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma

customer_reviews.title: Past ones didn't SMELL LIKE CHEMICALS!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product multiple times in the past 7 years since getting bed bugs in 2012. Most recently, before my delivery in the past few days, I purchased two of these just over a year ago. Mine delivered a few days ago SMELL LIKE CHEMICALS! I have chemical sensitivity and if I can't wash this smell out, this is garbage to me. I bought two this time. I'm so disappointed. I already washed them once and the smell is horrific.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpickles

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but definitely not super breathable.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material used seems great. The fit was pretty good and the long zipper makes installation very easy. I did find that the micro zipper liked to get hung up on itself and wasn’t the easiest to close. Unfortunately the one issue that I could look past was that it was not very breathable. Better then a plastic sheet for sure but not breathable enough for me to sleep comfortably. I will be trading in the waterproofing for something more breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST purchase especially if you've just bought a brand new bed that you've spend a good deal of money on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ASAP after I had bought a mattress top protector because I realized that a mattress top protector only covers the top not the bottom. This is a MUST purchase especially if you've just bought a brand new bed that you've spend a good deal of money on. I bought a brand new memory foam king bed and this has been protecting my bed. I Even love that it is zippered and velcro over top. This is a very important product and can't emphasize enough how important it is to keep your mattress and pillows protected.
customer_reviews.author: Torie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress protector! Other mattress protectors were too tight around my 13inch mattress and took away from the comfort. This protector was super easy to install (I installed it by myself), it fits great, and it doesn’t affect the comfort of the mattress at all. I would highly recommend this protector over others.
customer_reviews.author: Russel K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover and definitely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Not the easiest thing to remove or put back on, but it's as easy as it can be. I got this because I have a very old cat that sometimes has accidents on the bed. This thing is definitely water proof and machine washable. Only annoying thing is that when you throw it in the wash, there will be pockets of water that get trapped so might need to be careful when transferring to the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to insure that bed bugs won't get in my mattress if they do make it into my apartment and to help with my allergies with dust mites, etc. Good quality product, nicely made and washes well. I chose this brand because the bug vendor that services my apartment complex uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Description stated it would fit a 12" mattress. I have a 10" mattress and it did not zip all the way. It did fit around the mattress but was open at the end, not exactly effective. It was noisy. Every time you move it sounds like a potato chip bag is crinkling. No thanks. I got rid of them. Wish I had returned them right away.
customer_reviews.author: NancyDee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I stuck it on the matress bed bugs still were on the fringes of the zipper and the flap of the zipper so I wouldn't buy it if you're looking to aliviate bed bugs
customer_reviews.author: walter burville

customer_reviews.title: High quality mattress encasement
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of the material and zipper. It definitely seems durable enough to withstand washing and use for quite a while. As others have said, it is so well made that it is air tight and you have to "squish" out the air with the zipper almost closed. We put a mattress pad on top, and had no leaks through to the mattress with a few significant toddler urine accidents. I really like that it doesn't use toxic materials, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate website size choices
customer_reviews.text: Cover looks quality, but the description on sizes is inaccurate. I have a 15" thick mattress, so I chose the "15-18 inch size, believing the next size down, which was "9-12 inch", would be too small. The cover was HUGE for my 15" mattress! The retail packaging was marked as 18", not 15-18" (see photo). So I'll return it - but not sure what size to order. If I order the 9-12" option it will be too small. According to the retail packaging (and photo) the choices should be 9", 12", 15" and 18". I'll call Customer Service and then update my review
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover is great! Holds up very well in the wash and is for sure waterproof. I’ve had a couple pets have some accidents on the bed when they were ill; very large amounts of urine and to my surprise not a drop got through to the mattress. It isn’t the easiest to put back in since it goes around the entire mattress but that’s a small price to pay to keep stains off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Roy

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this item a short time but it has worked to protect my new mattress from spills and leaks from my toddler however the SECOND time I zipped it (I put it on the first time, removed to wash when soiled and was replacing) the zipper pull came off in my hand because the zipper has no stop at the end and is stitched and cut right where the zipper stops to close the cover. There is no way now to get the cover off without just ripping the zipper teeth apart and it will never close again. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Howell

customer_reviews.title: Really helps with my allergies
customer_reviews.text: After hours reviewing and selecting the mattress encasement that I had to ship to Singapore due to the size of our bed, I'm very happy with SafeRest (same with the Zippered Waterproof Pillow Protector). The texture is smooth and fluffy as described (and in other reviews) and doesn't feel like a plastified hospital bed. You need 2 people to fit the encasement: first time, we positioned the mattress vertically; it worked but is quite tiring. Second time onwards one of us now lift each corner while the other slides the bottom of the encasement below the mattress. With some nasal hygiene and this allergy-proof sleeping environment my allergies stopped in one week.
customer_reviews.author: Virginie

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like, but sorely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, but I can’t. I thought this would be a good solution for my bed wetting child since it mentioned it was waterproof as well as bedbug proof. Well I was wrong. This cover allowed the urine to soak right through and into the mattress. I was supremely disappointed. I will say that it was easy to get on and off. And the nice terry cloth makes it so it’s not hot. But breathable and waterproof shouldn’t go together if that’s the case. Save yourself the money and invest in one that is a full waterproof mattered cover. This is definitely not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: drjfish

customer_reviews.title: Bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: My family and I got a little scare of bed bugs, I saw a few and googled what it was I’ve never had them before! I stressed about everything that needed to be done with these bugs and debated between an exterminator or trying ourselves to get rid of them. We did it ourself and yes it’s a lot of work, but it works if you do it right. Buy bed bug treatment, this bed protected helped so much and was super easy to put on! Pillow protectors, and wash and DRY EVERYTHING. Also keep at the spray for weeks after and vacuum everyday I promise you will get rid of these evil little bugs.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: After a trip to California, I started getting bitten during the night. It wasn't every night, so I knew that it wasn't a large infestation. I didn't want to replace my relatively new mattress so I ordered this. Since I put it on six months ago, I haven't been bitten. I plan to keep it on for another six months, but I think my bedbug problems have been resolved. My only complaint is that my mattress is 10", so it is a bit too big, but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Reader from Nebraska

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and quality made
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this cover so there’s a couple of things I can’t comment on (waterproof, long-lasting). My first impression was, this is well-made... seems durable and it fits well. I wrestled with my large, heavy memory foam mattress and the cover didn’t rip and the zipper never snagged. The material isn’t cheap and the top layer is a nice terry cloth. After spending 20 minutes flipping the mattress, lifting corners to pull the cover over, rotating it, etc., I was ready to take a rest on it!
customer_reviews.author: rikki

customer_reviews.title: Loose but functional
customer_reviews.text: First things first it was big on my mattress usually is really snug but this one was really loose even after the mattress was fully inflated its still loose. So i tucked the loose part underneath. Next the top of like a Terry cloth which for the past two days i feel makes my bed really hot. I don't know if it's because of it but I'll have to dig deep to find out the cause. Everything came well packages zippers worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Talks With Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the buggers out
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I got a bedbug infestation and got rid of my bed after treatment. Read that new mattress, box spring and pillows must be encased. Bought all of those items from SafeRest and had bed delivery guys install the covers. Not sure what I’d have done otherwise... no bug penetration in 3 weeks but they have been about, killing the few in the dryer. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far I am extremely happy with the SafeRest mattress cover. It went on my king size mattress very easily. In fact, I put it on by myself. The fit was snug but still roomy enough that it has some 'give' room. The material felt strong yet soft. I didnt even notice it the first time I slept on it. Im not sure about the water resistance part, have not had to use that feature but it feels like it will be. The zipper closed with no issues but I did have to go slow while zipping it cause the zipper itself is small. I definitely feel protected having the mattress cover on my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover did not last, I do not recommend at all. We have needed to wash it several times, and after unzippering it a few times the zipper became stuck and very difficult to use. Most disappointingly it is not waterproof after several washings. We had a spill today and it soaked through and damaged a new mattress. We followed laundering instructions and there were no tears or visible damage. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: K Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great, so far!
customer_reviews.text: This cover was easier to put on our king mattress than I expected. The first night it was on our new mattress, my son had an accident on it. I was afraid the pee leaked through to the mattress, but it did not leak through at all! when I removed the cover to launder, I poured a cup of water on it and left it for half an hour as an experiment. It did not leak through at all. I am very impressed, I've had other mattress encasements and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Z. Moscowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great find for Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: The encasement fit perfectly and the zipper placement in the middle of the side of the box spring going 3/4 way around made it easy to maneuver into place, stuffing a bag. The material was sturdy and so was the stitching. At no time was I concerned that it would tear. I have moderate arthritis in my back, hips and hands and was able to do this by myself - just did it slowly and took breaks. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to rate...
customer_reviews.text: Just received product but I have faith this will live up to its mostly positive reviews & recommendations. I was able to put it on a full-sized mattress by myself, just had to take my time and follow instructions. Inspected for tears and laundered before using and find it fits just as it should (not much excess material as some reviews mentioned, seams & zipper intact). If I didn't know it was on the mattress, I wouldn't even be aware that the mattress was encased -- adds no bulk, makes no sound, virtually unnoticeable but, hopefully, effective.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I do not like about this is the fact that whenever you do ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover works very well. We have had a multiple spills and none have soaked into the mattress. The only thing I do not like about this is the fact that whenever you do need to clean it you have to remove your mattress to get it off. We did buy one of these slip-ons as well and we definitely prefer that over this type of mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: C. rinker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got these mattress protectors for my friend as she was bombarded by bedbugs. She put them on and it's been more than a week now but no more bedbug bites...of course she used some sprays before . she is very happy , and so am I. It's a great purchase ! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Inna B

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy is not durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchase both this and the box spring encasement both within a year failed me this the zipper popped and the box spring encasement develop holes on the bottom the company would only warranty this mattress encasement because of the zipper as far as the box spring encasement I was on my own they were rude they were short with me and they did not care that the product failed me both within a year do not buy this product you are wasting your money
customer_reviews.author: Michael McAuley

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY - not waterproof. This cover replaced my old PROTECT A BED and I should have went with what I knew worked. This cover was only on the bed since September 2019 and as January 2020 this stain appeared. I recognized the stain because I was replacing it with another cover because this kept so much heat. I’d wake up sweaty all the time. Which I never did with the PROTECT A BED. Not only is it hot but it doesn’t protect the mattress. And if you weren’t aware, a mattress warranty is void if there are any stains on it. So Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Zeps

customer_reviews.title: Utterly implausible to install
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what moron designed this, but the zippered section runs 3/4 the length of one side. I have a 9” mattress, and it’s geometrically impossible to put this on. 40 minutes of trying and we still can’t get it on. Would give it zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the soft cotton cover; it’s great quality at a much more reasonable price than other covers. We have a thick mattress, so it was nice find covers that have depth choices. This went on pretty easily— lay over mattress , unzip, slip bottom of cover underneath foot of mattress (it’s like a pillow case for the first few inches), scoot mattress partially off the end (Foot) of bed to tilt it up slightly, pull rest of cover under and over mattress, return mattress fully to bed, zip. Took 3 minutes at most, but was easiest with two people. ( you could do it alone and keep switching sides).
customer_reviews.author: BigFoot

customer_reviews.title: worth the money to protect your expensive mattress
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these, one queen size and one king size. they fit perfectly to my queen size traditional spring mattress and king size tuft and needle foam mattress. I love how it's completely waterproof for the mattress but still has a breathable surface. Note that it is still possible to get stain on the surface of the mattress cover, and it is a pain to wash because the inside is waterproof, any moisture will be trap inside and hard to dry. I had to tumble dry first and then hang dry for another couple hours to make sure it is complete dry.
customer_reviews.author: kamikity

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - Installed like a breeze
customer_reviews.text: We put this on a queen size 10" mattress. My husband stood the mattress on end and easily & smoothly slid the protector over the mattress. It zipped up neatly, easily and securely. The zipper appears well made and sealed securely. The materials felt good right out of the package and there was absolutely no odor that we could detect. We put this on a new mattress and do not have any bug issues. We just want to protect our new mattress and feel this should do the job. Very happy with it so far. It is new so I can't just comment on durability or ease to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I brought this because I needed a cover and it was cheap. I am sick of paying $70 for the "good" ones. What I did not realize is the top is like a thin towel material. In the summer I think it may be hot however my washer is broken with my sheets inside so I've spend 2 nights directly on this matress cover and did not wake up uncomfortable. For the price I would recommend. No input as to how durable or waterproof it is I've only had it a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My building suffered a bed bug problem. I purchased SafeRest Premium Mattress Encasement, along with the boxspring encasement and pillow covers after I began waking up with bites. These products give you not only protection but piece of mind! I am now protected against any further outbreaks and am no longer waking up to find I've been nibbled on - this is a must buy for anyone living in a multi-unit dwelling! Super easy to put on! I had no problem doing it myself.
customer_reviews.author: D Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke off
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke off after I put it on the second time.. now I am shopping for another mattress protector because I cannot take it off and wash it - no zipper, to zip it back up🤷🏼‍♀️ It serves its purpose until the zipper is intact and if you never plan take it off and wash it - buy it 😉
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Although is it one of the more expensive like mattress protectors that you will find out there... ITS TOTALLY WORTH IT! I seen a few reviews where people said it was loud or had a plastic-like noise to it when you move around or get out of bed, which made me leery to buy it. But happy to say.. no plastic or annoying like sounds when we've moved around on it or at least not to where it becomes a problem or noticeable. And the zipper design on this is pretty legit. Just saying.. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of mattress size!
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is off on the Amazon listing! If you look at the picture, you can see they have 9in/12in/15in/18in sizes. The material isn't stretchy. So you want to get the minimum size that is greater than the thickness of the mattress. In other words, if you have a 12in thick mattress, you want the size that Amazon lists as "9-12in thick." The "12-15in" size is WAY too large for my mattress. I got the 9-12in, and it's perfectly sized. Other than that, once it's on, you'll forget it's there. You can't feel it through your sheets. In fact, my mattress has patterning on it, and I could feel that more than the terry-cloth top of the protector.
customer_reviews.author: quirk

customer_reviews.title: As expected... but
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these in a row... they feel natural when laying on and I trust that they work. However, it is very difficult to get any stains out of it by washing it (sweat stains, etc.). I replace it about once a year... It also seems that some moisture gets through the encasement as our mattress has some stains now too...
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs sleep with me and right now I have a 6mth old puppy. One morning, I thought I would push thw snooze button and get an extra 10mins of sleep. Well my puppy had other plans and decided she could not wait any longer to go outside so she peed on my bed (a lot). Luckily, I had this protector on and not a drop went through on my expensive new mattress. Took it off, washed in warm water, tumble dry low (took forever) and put it back on. No damage done!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof! Well made, worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: These are really great- they are actually waterproof, very well constructed, the seams are tightly and thoughtfully stitched. Keeps the allergies much more at bay. I tested it with red wine- no problem! And it seems well enough constructed to trust it for dust mites and the scary resurgence of bed bugs I keep hearing about- this makes me feel much better when I or my co-op neighbors travel. For the record, I recently tried a cheaper one, labeled "amazon's choice" that's very popular. Don't do it, the cheaper ones are awful and there is no way they do what this one does.
customer_reviews.author: amphibia

customer_reviews.title: Funny that I know to wash and dry thrift store ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a mattress ruined when I got bedbugs and had everything sprayed. Funny that I know to wash and dry thrift store items but didn't when I bought from a garage sale! This encasement will keep them from getting into the mattess so if you ever do encounter the buggers your mattress will be fine. Do go on SafeRest site to find the correct height size! They have 9 to 12, 12 to 15, and 15 to 18 inch heights. Easy to put on- it zips on three sides with a pocket at the bottom. Haven't tested it for being waterproof, but there is vinyl on all sides. It has a comfortable terry top
customer_reviews.author: denilea

customer_reviews.title: Soft mattress protector which is vinyl free
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mattress protector that had non toxic materials. We co-sleep with our baby and just changed just about everything - right from the bed to the mattress to the pillows, sheets and comforter. After a lot of research this one fit the budget and criteria. While the product is good, the cotton terry is soft, I found that it is much cheaper online. Again it was one of those things that disappoint you about amazon, where you assume you're getting the best deal but a web search shows you otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Ad

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely put to the test as it is an exact replacement of a cover that got a huge blood stain from a bloody nose (all is well - dry winter weather complication). The mattress under this cover didn't get touched with the blood and this cover saved us, so great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress cover ever: a TRUE mattress cover !!
customer_reviews.text: mattress covers always come off on the corners and we have to pull the cover back under the mattress to keep it in place. The SafeRest Premium cover is an all around cover with a hidden zipper. Consequently, the mattress is indeed covered and protected against any water or liquids. It is a great buy and you will never have to deal with the corners coming off the mattress. Highly recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: ORCPA-MB

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality bed covers. I recently had the none zip around covers from this brand, but my doctor told me that I needed the fully enclosed zip around for both my mattress and my box spring. These zip around covers are high quality and have helped me with my allergysand have also helped me with feeling bugs all over me sensations. I wouldn't live life without these. I suffer from all kinds of allergys and have to always buy everything hypoallergenic if not I'll have itchy skin and these do the trick for me. I feel safe in my own bed now.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I received this encasement yesterday and put it on my new mattress. The first thing I noticed is five sides of this item have a nice feel to it, made of cotton, as opposed to others that have a plasticky feel to them. the top is terry which is nice but personally I think it is unnecessary. I would appreciate the top to be like the other five sides just as much. the protector zipped up nicely and was covered up at the end by a Velcro top. It is very quiet, have no problems with this. it is worth spending a few dollars more for this.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice just be careful with the zipper
customer_reviews.text: We just bought it last week. It looks pretty nice so far. It fits our mattress perfectly. The only issue I had was with the zipper. When I zipped it all the way thru the end, the zipper started opening up and it wouldn't close properly. However; after opening it all the way and closing it again, did the trick and so far we are loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: This has a terry cloth surface (on top of the plastic), so you're never getting any feeling of plastic, and associated heat / discomfort / noise, through your fitted sheet. Seals the entire mattress. Easy to put on, take off, wash, and put back on. Protects the place where we all spend 1/3 of our lives, safeguarding a rather pricey mattress (in our case), against odors, spills, ensuring years of use--and we never know it's there. Looked at a lot of products. Tried one or two others. Hands-down, a superior product, and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: American West

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, a bit loose
customer_reviews.text: We have a 10" mattress and I bought the 9-12" first, but it was way too loose. So I bought the smallest size, 5-9", and it fit perfectly. I don't know why the top should be terry cloth, not sure what the advantage is, but it's good quality and not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: annageish

customer_reviews.title: For allergy sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I’m severely allergic to dust mites, this mattress encasement has helped a lot. Before getting this I used to wash my bedsheets twice a week and still got rashes and seriously itchy skin after waking up (and my sleep quality was also horrible). So if you have allergy to dus mites and can’t sleep well, look no further- I recommend also getting anti dust mites pillow cases and duvet/ comforter covers at the same time. I live in a very hot and humid part of the world, and now I only have to wash my beddings twice a month.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This mattress encasement was exactly what I was looking for. My main goal was to protect my mattress from everything in the apartment complex. An added benefit is that it helps against allergens that have a negative affect on my breathing problems. There's also no vinyl to tear or make you sweat. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! I bought gmfor my brand new mattress which is egg shell white because I have dogs. Sure enough one puked on my sheets while I was at work and guess what is NOT water proof. This mattress protector. Now my brand new mattress has a big yellow stain on it. I'm livid.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Showen

customer_reviews.title: Doing it’s job, fits a bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This enváseme y was easy to put on the mattress. It fits bigger than expected. I measured the height of my mattress to be 10” so I picked the Amazon option for 9-12” the package I received said it was the 12” one I wish they would have sent me the 9” to fit tighter. I left it on and with the sheets on, it doesn’t move so it works so far. I bought it because of potential allergies to dust mites and let me tell you! I’ve been sleeping perfectly at night with no itchy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: It fit my new memory foam mattress perfectly (12"). A tiny bit loose but better than too tight. I was amazed at how easy it was to put on, the zipper goes all the way around so I was able to slide it on a Queen mattress by myself, easily. I washed it before using and it came out perfectly. Have not tested it for spills yet, and thankfully not for bugs either, so can't say. But it makes me feel better to have it on there, and I use a regular mattress pad on top of it, so I won't be taking it on and off much. There was no noise or plastic feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind and a breath of fresh air with SafeRest Zippered Mattress Encasements
customer_reviews.text: With the help of my sister to move the mattress, it was very easy to put on the mattress encasement. The zippers were great, the encasements had a nice scent, they were clean, and the whole experience was delightful. After both the box spring and the mattress encasements were on it was like a fresh start. We dusted under the bed before putting them on. Also these encasements were not made of vinyl which I have heard is too hot. SafeRest products made for comfortable sleep. I highly recommend SafeRest Zippered Mattress Encasements.
customer_reviews.author: Denise McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Fit mattress perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is great, it has a zipper that makes it fairly simple to put on the mattress if you have help. I would recommend having someone help you when zipping it up so that the zipper does not have to be pulled tightly to close. I would recommend this product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: shoppergal

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the zip cover with the comfort of knowing nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: This was totally worth the investment! I had bought this item when I purchased a new bed and put it on the mattress. I had an older dog that slept with me and she was sick. She wet the bed in her sleep. Thankfully I had this on my new mattress. I took it off and put it in the washer. Protected my mattress and left me with ease of knowing nothing could damage my mattress. I recommend the zip cover with the comfort of knowing nothing can spill on the sides of your mattress. The whole thing is protected..
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Post Bedbug spray
customer_reviews.text: My old roommates cat brought bed bugs in the house TWICE, after the secondf ull house spray down I forced everyone to get a mattress bag and they didn't come back.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hovey

customer_reviews.title: zipper burst durring normal use and customer service has yet to call me back
customer_reviews.text: used for a little over a month and zipper came apart. Called customer service and they said someone would call me back and no one has called for two weeks. terrible product and warrantee support from customer service@!very difficult to install. you have to lift mattress standing up to install. not easy at all. do not buy
customer_reviews.author: DON

customer_reviews.title: Good value for protecting an expensive household purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to buy this cover. We got a new bed for our guest room and wanted to make sure it was protected. The encasement protects from allergens and accidental bed wetting. It also doesn’t make noise when you move around in your sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Whitten

customer_reviews.title: liked it (just 1 week ahead)
customer_reviews.text: I have just a week with it and it covers my expectations it's comfortable, the fabric feels good and fresh, easy to install, easy to wash... had a little accident with water and it went well no damage at all, i follow (and it is very important) all the care instructions to keep the water resistant protection, i don't have a bed bug problem but we feel protected, also my toddler sleeps with us most of the night so any accident is well covered :) thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product, which recently proved itself when my dog had an accident on the bed. Protected the mattress with no issue. And unlike fitted-sheet-style protectors that I've used before, this one stays in place since it zips around the whole mattress. It's not all that difficult to put it on by myself either, which I also really appreciate. Just bought another one today in the king size.
customer_reviews.author: Going Back to California Someday

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fits great. Just pay attention to the measurements the product detail states clearly. Quality!eside the effectiveness of keeping bugs/mites out...the main thing that is most important to me is that it doesn't make ANY noise. Some of these similar products can 'rustle' and make noise when anyone moves. This one is silent!
customer_reviews.author: AdaminSD

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is misleading Order smallest if mattress is 12inches.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this wonderful encasement, The first one lasted over 10 years. The sizing is a little off though- sizes... 9-12”, 12-15”, etc. I ordered the 9-12” because my mattress is 12” but it's too big. I will be returning it for the smaller one as these are supposed to fit snugly. Other than the sizing discrepancy I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barone

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It seals very well. The cover appears to be of quality, just make sure you follow the washing instructions to not damage it. Installing it can be a little bit difficult doing it on your own, so it may be helpful to have an extra hand. Overall it has been holding up serving it's purpose
customer_reviews.author: Axel Verde S.

customer_reviews.title: Mattress Encasement
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson put on the dorm mattress to insure he's safety while using a mattress others have been using. He liked it and gave him a peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Garland

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 full size and one twin according to mattress depth. These washed and dried no problem and once on the mattress it fit like a glove. So air tight that we had to lay in the mattress and open the zipper a bit to let air out and then zipped it all the way shut and it was like shrink wrap on the mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Porter

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it saved our mattress from a couple of my spills...and it's comfy, not plasticky.. Also neither of us has to stagger out of bedrom in the morning as if we're sleeping rough on ground outsife. Very comfy, molds to yr body insteasd of being rigid like the Stearns & Foster we inherited.
customer_reviews.author: SJ NYC

customer_reviews.title: some part of edge is broken
customer_reviews.text: received two days ago, tried to use yesterday, found the some part was broken.....
customer_reviews.author: M. Z.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our new king mattress. It is nice and snug on king mattress. Went with the 9-12in size. The top is like a terry cloth material. I sleep warm at night so I think it will make some warm. Not a lot of rustling and as long as it does its job. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Airy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tuft and Needle
customer_reviews.text: This works really well on my Tuft and Needle Queen, but has two extra inches over the mattress height. That wasn't really a problem on it's own, but it allowed me to add a two inch topper and now I really love it. If you are planning on that setup, I really like the Linenspa 2" gel infused memory foam topper sold here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for bugs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these mattress protecto6r to help deal with a sudden bed bug finding after getting a used dresser. This claims to prevent the bugs from being able to infest the mattress. Didnt mention that they would just find the seam on the protector and live there. I have had these for 2 months while I have had my house sprayed and washing and changing all bedding every other day. Not worth the money. Water resistance seems decent.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping tight with this allergy blasting cover
customer_reviews.text: So Far, So GOOD. Bought this from AMZN because of the ratings and comments. The construction was what we wanted for dust mite control and it is watertight as promised. We read comments about problems and were very gentle with installing it on my 12-inch thick mattress. It took two of us to handle the bulky mattress, and after putting it on, we liked the cover's somewhat flexible fit. Fitted sheets stayed put on this mattress cover, so we're optimistic about our future with SafeRest products.
customer_reviews.author: SewSparkle

product_meta.title: SafeRest Premium Zippered Mattress Encasement - Lab Tested Bed Bug Proof, Dust Mite and Waterproof - Hypoallergenic, Breathable, Noiseless and Vinyl Free (Fits 9-12 in. H) - Queen Size
product_meta.description:
Material Type:9-12" Deep| Size:Queen

SafeRest Lab Tested Encasements Protect Your Mattress Against Bed Bugs, Fluids, Dust Mites and Allergens

Through extensive research and development, SafeRest has created a better way to protect your mattress from bed bug infestations while at the same time providing real health benefits for those who suffer from daily allergy and asthma triggers. Those who perspire while sleeping or have children, pets or incontinence will also benefit from SafeRest's waterproof technology.

Lab Tested and Certified Bed Bug Proof 
Our encasements were specifically designed and lab tested for complete bed bugs and allergy protection combining cutting edge Micro-Zippers along with breathable bed bug and allergen proof fabric. Rather than disposing of expensive unprotected mattress sets, SafeRest encasements seal and safeguard your mattress against potential bed bugs.

Hypoallergenic Soft Cotton Terry Surface - Breathable, Cool and Noiseless 
To keep our encasements cool and noiseless, the surface material is made with hypoallergenic soft cotton terry back coated with a breathable 100% waterproof membrane layer. Our premium cotton terry naturally absorbs moisture and is completely noiseless.

Exclusive 360 Secure Velcro Flap with Exclusive Micro-Zipper
Our patented 360 Secure Velcro flap protects the zipper from accidental openings while our exclusive Micro-Zipper blocks any size bed bug from passing through the zipper's teethe.

Machine Washable
Machine-wash with your sheets using normal household detergents that do not contain bleach. Tumble dry on low heat. Do not iron.

SafeRest encasements contain no vinyl, phthalates, flame retardants or PVCs and are backed by a full replacement 10-year warranty. (Queen Size 60" x 80" x 12")
feature_bullets: Independently lab tested and certified bed bug entry, escape and bite proof (Queen Size 60" x 80" x 12") OEKO-TEX Certified (SH025 151792)
Surrounds and protects the mattress on all 6-sides against allergens, dust mites, bed bugs, bacteria, fluids, perspiration and urine (10-year warranty and machine washable)
Exclusive Micro-Zipper technology prevents all stages of bed bugs from passing through the zippers teeth
360 Secure zipper closing feature prevents accidental openings by sealing the end zipper traveler with a Velcro flap

Premium cotton terry surface material with breathable hypoallergenic membrane backing keeps the mattress cool and noiseless while blocking dust mites and other allergens (great for those with asthma and allergies)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,167 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
